description: Blanc-Verger Farm, managed by Guillaume and Virginie, represents a modern approach to sustainable farming and local diversification. Located on 80 hectares and home to 100 robust Gerzean cows, the farm focuses on high-quality dairy production, with Guillaume overseeing daily operations and pasture management. Virginie has expanded the farmâ€™s offerings by developing an ice cream and frozen pastry business, distributing to local markets and through a small farm shop. The farm operates in partnership with cooperatives and organizations like CIVAM to implement eco-friendly practices, showcasing an effective model of resilience and local food production in agriculture.
name: Ferme Blanc Verger
